projects.title: Good News
projects.shortDesc: Stay informed with AI-powered news summaries.
projects.description: A Service which scrapes news articles from various sources, summarizes them using AI, and delivers the summaries to users via a Telegram bot. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and integrates with Gemini for summarization.

projects.title: Smart Chat
projects.shortDesc: An AI chat platform integrating multiple AI services.
projects.description: Smart-Chat is an innovative conversational AI platform that orchestrates responses from multiple AI services, delivering high-quality, personalized interactions in real-time. Built with a robust Node.js architecture, it seamlessly integrates various AI SDKs, manages multi-platform evaluations, and supports dynamic chat sessions. Developed as part of a Software Engineering B.Sc. Final Project.

projects.title: Cookie
projects.shortDesc: Manage your groceries and shopping list with friends easily, and shop together with fun!
projects.description: A mobile app that helps families and friends manage their groceries and shopping lists together. Group by departments and remember history of purchases. Built with React-Native, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

projects.title: Wiki-Song
projects.description: This project is about creating a local development for scraping and manage data via API using Docker Compose for Data Pipeline. The environment includes multiple services that interact with each other to scrape data from a website, process it, and store it in PostgreSQL database.

projects.title: Web SQLI attack
projects.shortDesc: A simple website to demonstrate SQLI attack.
projects.description: An 3rd year project for security course. A simple website and Python tool to demonstrate SQLI attack and how to prevent it. Built with HTML, JS, CSS and Python.

projects.title: Fixit
projects.shortDesc: Have you ever struggled mapping the gaps in construction at work, school, or home?
projects.description: Have you ever struggled mapping the gaps in construction at work, school, or home? A Good practice for mobile development. An implementation of Express server which connected to mongo and a React-Native.

projects.title: Donation App
projects.description: A Good practice for full-stack implement and postman collection documentation. An implementation of Express server which connected to mongo and a React-App.

projects.title: Medigment
projects.shortDesc: An easy way to manage medications in your daily routine.
projects.description: The final project of Web & Cloud course. An app which handles medication management and supply. Great practice and learning about writing SRS & SDD, plan diagrams and build the idea in PHP, JS and our design.

projects.title: Book Store
projects.shortDesc: An app for searching and filtering books.
projects.description: Book store app where you can filter or search for books and read a descriptions about it. A project in Web & Cloud course.

projects.title: Meals App
projects.shortDesc: Recipes app for the best meals.
projects.description: Recipes app for the best meals. Created by Flutter to IOS & Android (native) from Udemy Flutter & dart course.
